description: Great vibes, great happy hour 2-7.  8$ Signature cocktails and always a great crowd. One of the few places with great cocktails and a tv where you can catch the g
author: Joseph B.

description: Went there with a cuple of coworkers, excellent choices on the food menu and the cocktails selection is great, they offer something for every taste and staff is super friendly and fast too....this is definitely a great spot to unwind and have a good time after a workday. thanks Israel for the recomendation, can't wait to go back on Taco Tuesday !!!
author: Nancy Z.

description: Topsy's is a great venue! It's a super fun environment and the service is great! The food and the cocktails are super tasty! I was recommended by Chef Israel and I am sure to come back again soon!
author: Nastassia W.

description: In town for Oracle Open World and stumbled upon this place. Mark the bartender was very helpful with selecting the perfect cocktail for me. I'm not the type who like sweet drink so this is the perfect spot. All signature cocktails are fresh and delicious. I recommend the dry passion, cucumber gimlet, and strawberry basil martini. Great place to network in the financial district. A must stop in for a drink. May I add happy hr all day Monday!!!
author: Ali M.

description: 3 1/2 stars. Good happy hour with a lot of locals hanging out. A bitBit noisy and the food was mediocre. But what do you expect for happy hour with two dollar Tuesday tacos. We don't eat meat and they only offered before chicken tacos. They were willing to substitute any vegetables for a veggie taco.
author: Kipp Y.

description: The best cocktail I've ever had!!! I will be coming back for twisted berry for sure! Nice atmosphere, friendly bartenders and great deals for drinks!
author: Ekaterina F.

description:
Fabulous place. Music at correct volume. Whimsical. Feeling of mad and benevolent clowns about you. Elements from a carnival - in the spring stools etc Yet a very bar-bar feeling. Good drinks :) 
I had the Old Fashioned. Nice Pizza - want it to go just one step further though.. the veg Margherita. Add goat cheese maybe, and caramelised onions. Yum Argula salad.
I went with my girl-friends and we laughed and talked the evening away. It was a weekday. No rush but buzzing place. The bar also looked good to sit at.
I think we got the best place though, a cozy corner.
The guy serving us was really nice and brought out all the 'awww..' feelings in me as he went around on a broken leg/ injured ligament.. smthing like that :o
Topsy is really close to the Montgomery Bart station. So that's a big big thing.
Oh yeah.. the tables need to be a little bigger. It is impossible to fit drinks and food on them even as one plate of food comes in. That's why maybe the servers are keen on whisking away a plate as soon as it starts getting empty, but I had to tell them like twice to not take the food away, revealing my greedy pig side.. which I just want to be, secretly :D
Will be returning here. Topsyyyyy!!! 
Remember to look up at the ceiling if you go :)
author: Malvika B.

description: Topsy's is a great spot. Went here many times on happy hour after work to grab a cocktail or two, and was never disappointed. The decor of the place is warm, place is spacious and the lightening is just right. There are nice couches along the wall that are perfect for large groups of people or a date. They play live music on Wednesdays and all day happy hour every Monday. Bartenders are very friendly and make awesome drinks. Definitely recommended place for an after work happy-hour or a date.
author: Rodion S.

description: I enjoyed the drinks and the atmosphere. We stumbled across this bar and it was the best find. I would go back for sure.
author: Tre G.

description: Poor pours, try to bribe people with a free appetizer (hummus or deviled eggs) for a great Yelp review. Drinks are shaken so much they are icy.  Weak, very weak
author: Tammie S.

description: I found this place while my company was opening up a office in downtown San Francisco. Great place, live music and awesome drinks!
author: Tommy B.

description: We went there for Margaritas and it was okay. Their bar stools are pretty cool though :)
author: Namrata H.

description: It was my last night in San Francisco from a short getaway with my sister and I'm so glad I ended it with a night at Topsy's! The drinks were great and the house brew was excellent. People were nice and the live music was perfect! Can't wait to come back for my next vacation in San Francisco.
author: Monique R.

description: My friends and I love this place. There's something about the atmosphere and cozy design of this bar that makes us come back here every time. The bartenders are wonderful and friendly, and they make amazing drinks. I recommend!
author: Valentin T.

description:
Relaxed and stylish ambiance at this bar spot. Pretty, tantalizing, and exceptionally friendly/charming bartenders who know a great deal about their craft, and provide expedient service. Topsy's Mule cocktail was superb. They even have their own Topsy's beer, an ale, that they'd gladly offer to taste to anyone drinking beer. The spring bar stools are quite cool, unless you're sufficiently hammered to realize that you're not going to get catapulted into the glass ceiling filled with toys and circus gadgets.

Looking forward to checking out their live band extravaganza.
author: Oleg G.

description: My office mates and I stumble upon this place after our Holiday luncheon.  We needed a place close to the city club that was open at 2pm.  Very good choice on our end.  The place was empty so we were pretty much able to take it over.  The drinks were creative and really tasty and the service was excellent.  I would definitely go back here should I need a place for an after work happy hour in the city.
author: Kirsten M.

description: Finally a great spot in downtown area!!! I've there several times already and loved it! Great drinks ( my favorite is contortionist, strawberry basil martini and on a stronger side the one with bourbon they put on fire- don't remember the exact name but something with flames) and now they started serving food- really delicious blinchiki( Russian Crepes) are so yummy! It's definitely a nice place to chill out with friends!!;-)
author: Natalia L.

description: Very cool, almost steampunk...ish. Chill down to earth cute bartenders. Amazingly only half full on weekdays...nice.
author: Scott D.

description: I found my favorite go to place close to the office. This is a great addition for the FiDi, I love the atmosphere and how fun are those bars stools?!? So whimsical and fun they nailed it with the theme...great remodel. It is a classy establishment and they use the freshest ingredients in their drinks. Their staff is very friendly and super attentive. They have a happy hour and all their drinks are pretty delicious. I am a fan of the Topsys. Angela just created an amazing drink called the BACK FLIP, so amazing and refreshing~you have to try a few, trust you wont be disappointed! Another perk they have live music! :)
author: Jennifer H.

description: Was a super crowded Friday night, yet the bartender acknowledged us with a greeting and menu. Then she proceeded to make me the best Leechy martini I've ever had ! So good! Refreshing, not sweet! Crowded but seems like a nice environment , it was a quick stay but was enjoyable .
author: Ladyreyes R.

description: Spoke with Angela (the owner) and she profusely apologized and offered to reimburse me for everything. She was super sweet and I really appreciate the offer - hopefully I don't run into any more issues here!
author: Snigdha G.

description: This is a great place to go for happy hour drinks in the financial district after work! Weekday nights around 530 is the least crowded, Friday after work is packed! Super fun though and delicious drinks, not weak like most other happy hours.
author: Tiffany M.

description: Topsy's bar is unique! The springy chairs and subtle funhouse decorations bring a playful aspect to your drinking cocktails and socializing experience. The clowns definitely are a great conversation starter whether you like them or not! The drinks are creative and I noticed they change up the cocktail menu every once in a while! Which is exciting for me because I love tasting new and different cocktails. The staff are always friendly and care about you having a good time.
author: Yana N.

description: yum! dickelll berry is amazing. so tasty. black berries. friendly bar tender, and this is why you don't write reviews on your phone after a few drinks.
author: Alison M.

description: Fantastic place in Financial district with a great vibe and most welcoming bartenders. Great place to grab drinks with coworkers, very happening for a happy hour, certainly becoming a regular here.
author: Lala D.

description: Super fun place, delicious and strong drinks, good hanging out spot in the middle of SF Financial District. The bartenders are super friendly and fun, most of them is from Eastern Europe, so if you are from Eastern Europe, you can feel like at home :0))Fun all night long happy hours on Mondays!
author: Natalia N.

description: We went here during their Happy Hour. The drinks were delicious & the spring barstools were so much fun! Loved it!
author: Noelle M.

description: I'm thankful that there are bars in Downtown which cater to live music lovers. Friendly service and good atmosphere without the clout and expense of neighboring Rickhouse.
author: Paul C.

description: Excellent well-balanced cocktails.  Friendly bar-staff and cool decor - warm and comfortable but has refined design elements.  Sit on the springy bar stools for some extra added fun.
author: Dan B.

description: Wow.  Looked like a nice place. But the bartender Victoria was rude as hell.  We left after one drink, would have stayed because the place seems nice. Too many cool bars in the area i'd rather give my money too than someone who treats her patrons as a burden.
author: Mike A.

description: I modified the Moscow Mule w/ Hendricks and it was absolutely delicious. The bar stools made w/ springs pay homage to the bar's name and are playful and fun. Highly recommend.
author: K. C.

description:
Wow.  Coolest place in the world!  Well, could have been the drinks ( but don't think so ).

The decor is awesome - like sipping perfectly made drinks in a toy box.  Great service, good prices, cool crowd.  It can get crowded so I will get there earlier next time but it wouldn't keep me from going back if I didn't.

top grade,  made my list of hang outs. I'll be back.
author: Chris G.

description:
I ordered a Maker's rocks and it had bugs in it, and that shouldn't happen. I can't believe I'm the first to encounter this here. 

They apologized, and it seemed genuine, but I didn't see them throw away the bottle, nor did they offer another drink.

I think they serve food here, which I would avoid. Stick with bottled beer. Gross.
author: eric c.

description: Friendly bartenders. fun cocktail drinks.
author: Xteethx B.

description: Quirky, little place.  Drinks were good, bartenders were friendly and solicitous. Happy Hour on a Friday started at 2pm! The place was crowded, but easy enough to make room and get a drink.
author: George T.

description: We recently hosted a happy hour for a staffing company here and it went perfectly.  Reuben was super helpful in every step of the process and so attentive during the event, making sure we had everything we needed.  If you are planning on hosting a happy hour or event definitely keep Topsy's in mind!
author: Alicia M.

description: Best happy hour in the 'hood. Especially if you like well-crafted cocktails. And especially if it's Monday night. I had an Old Fashioned, the Veal Cutter, and a Penicillin. All of them delicious whiskey cocktails. All while watching MNF.  Cool atmosphere and good vibe.
author: Greg C.

description: Love the atmosphere and music! Better yet drinks are great, and bartenders are super cute and friendly. Definitely one of the top destinations for happy hour in San Francisco! And they have bouncing stools at the bar! Try moving left and right, you won't be able to stop!!
author: Yuliya H.

description: If you are working out of downtown or financial district - this is the best place for happy hour! Hands down. Whether you prefer a fancy cocktail or plain ol' dirty vodka martini, like i do...   Make sure you ask for Inna P., the friendliest bartender in the world!
author: Vasil A.

description:
Really good drinks, fair prices, great atmosphere, and very knowledgeable bartenders. Sasha was my bartender and she made a fantastic drink that was not even on the menu! Amazing!  That type of quality is woefully lacking in a lot of other places - I hope management gives her a raise because she made the trek to Topsy's worthwhile with her creative mixology skills.

I usually hang out in other parts of SF but this a definite must see in FiDi for top notch drinks.  Only slight complaint would be the food menu.  Would be good to see things like Mac and cheese, and more decent proportions than what they currently offer....
author: Linus L.

description: SO GLAD we stumbled upon this bar! The drinks were so delicious... Like dangerously good. The bartender, Kirstie, was such a pro. She was fast, friendly, and made great cocktails. It was such a relief getting great service in downtown SF where the bars usually have an overwhelming sense of preciousness and entitlement. Here, you are treated to the best... Including customer service. ALSO the band was amazing!!! This is an awesome bar we will definitely be back!! Thanks Kirstie!!
author: Dayne D.

description: I like this place. Bartenders are super-friendly, and the owner lady is very courteous. Some fancy drinks to explore, and funny bar seats on giant springs to test. Showing major soccer events - World Cup, Euro, Champions league, etc. Look forward to visiting Topcy's again.
author: Andrei K.

description: Local to SF and a staple in the financial district of downtown. Great staff, very good food and great happy hour. Always a good time.
author: Shea T.

description: Happy Hour is always a good time at Topsy's. Ask for Victoria!!! She makes delicious cocktails and pours a great scotch on the rocks...Victoria is a pro and will make sure you are always well taken care of!!!
author: Chris O.

description: Strawberry basil martini is the best!!! Good pours, fun crowd, great place for a Friday night out!
author: Maggie P.

description: Great location, delicious drinks, friendly staff and alway popping.  I'm a regular and will be coming back for many years!  Try the strawberry Margarita.  Wow!
author: Arthur K.

description: This place is classy with a twist of fun! I LOVE the cocktails at Topsy. I'm a lover of tequila and most places just don't know what to do with tequila. Bartender's always just suggest I do a shot?! If I wanted to do a shot, I would just pour myself one at home. I highly recommend this place for a great atmosphere and tasty drinks! They also have a fabulous HH!
author: Maniveo K.

description: I love coming in to Topsys after work. Great drinks, friendly atmosphere. Bartenders really care about your drinks. I would single out Sasha, she is wonderful, polite and always knows how to fix your drinks.
author: Felix G.

description: I got a strawberry margarita, and it was very refreshing! The bartender was really friendly and brought our drinks out fairly fast. Great service!
author: Stephanie C.

description:
It's been about two months since my last review. They got rid of the creepy (not in a bad way) nutcracker statues, which used to be out front, redid the font of the front signage, and I think redid some of the interior. I can't remember what it looked like, before. This place is pretty popular now, but I've been able to snag a seat at the bar fairly easily. It's clean, pretty efficient service, and pretty tasty drinks. I've gotten the dickleberry (or whatever it's called) on occasion, and enjoy it. 

Quieter and more laid back than a certain nearby bar with interior wood paneling.
author: B Y.

description: I absolutely love this bar! Such a great hang out spot for a little after work happy hour. Bartenders are oh so super friendly and drinks are truly awesome. Super fun decor. Just take a moment and look up to the ceiling and you'll see. It's such a super cool place. You owe it to yourself to check it out for sure.
author: Patrick R.

description:
Their strawberry basil martini is amazing!!  My new favorite drink.
Our bartender was extremely friendly and knowledgable; unfortunately I didn't catch her name.
author: Katie D.

description: I was at this bar on friday and I really liked it, I thought it was very creative (the ceiling). The bar was clean and the bartender.. Her name was Inna was very nice and make me a great old fashioned! Compliments to her! I will be back for sure as this bar is on my walk home. Very nice bar, drinks and nice bartenders!
author: Mike T.

description:
Topsy's is a great new place in Union Square. The drinks are delicious and the bartenders are really friendly. The decor has a circus type of them, which is very unique and fresh for the area.

Karina was great and made me some excellent drinks.  She is incredibly friendly and does a great job of making someone feel welcome in the bar. Antonio, the other bartender working that night, was incredibly friendly as well.
author: Kofi K.

description: Super cute theme!! I went here for drinks after work with friends and it's adorable. The bartender was really friendly too.
author: Ashley F.

description: Good cocktail (Topsy), disappointing charcuterie, particularly the ham cold cut slice. Good service, love the decor! I wonder if the giant spring bar stool is actually bouncy.
author: Maximillian M.

description: Fantastic bar and you are missing out if you don't stop by . Great service , great environment , excellent drinks and the music is on point . You are messing up if you don't stop by !
author: Grant T.

description: Best bar in SF and the best in the Financial District, plus they are open when no one else is, especially at 3 pm on a Saturday.
author: Michael H.

description: Damn good bar. Always fun after work crowd, good drinks, bartenders are fun and engaging. Gets packed with FiDi crowd but thats the fun part. Overall great place to grab drinks early in the night
author: Phillip F.

description: This place is the best place to grab a drink downtown.  I had fun having my friends meet me here for my birthday.  Great people and great place.
author: Pierre N.

description: Very found of this place, it's always fun and lively :) location is great, wonderful bartenders and delicious HH cocktails.
author: Tetyana G.

description: Super cute! Doesn't look like much from  the outside, but inside it's quaint, kooky, vintage, and fun! I ordered the Strawberry basil martini and loved it so much I got 2! Never have I seen this cocktail anywhere and it was definitely worth coming back for. Amazing! Super nice bartender too.
author: Unicorn U.

description: Came here with my sister after a relaxing facial at Cintas Aveda across the street! Interesting place.  Bartender/server, Mark was super nice, friendly and FAST!  He came back with our drinks in less than 5 minutes!!!  Not a lot of food choices but great drinks.  The drinks were tasty and perfect.  Did not water down with mostly ice cubes!!!!  The lychee martini was yummy and so the the Topsy Mule.  Will definitely be back to try the strawberry basil martini and another lychee martini.
author: Karen S.

description: Great customer service - the manager/staff are really trying to make a strong first impression on the happy hour crowd in fidi.  Go here to grab drinks with friends as too loud for a first date spot.  Also if you are looking for more mixology cocktails, I wouldn't recommend this spot though appreciate their service and level of attention!
author: Melissa E.

description: Get here for happy hour!  Great service!!Place is bouncing after 5! Cool cocktails. Cool bar stools. Cool ambiance. Cool bartenders. Try the Red Top!
author: Charlie A.

description: Good place, reasonably priced drinks. Gets kinda loud, but hey it's a bar.
author: Katherine D.

description: Friendly bartender and great drinks! I know it must be hard working on Christmas Eve but they did a fantastic job at making us feel welcome! Thanks so much for your fantastic service !
author: Lisa B.

description: I love this place! Had a birthday celebration here on Friday, and had an amazing time. The manager Ilya was very accommodative, the bartenders are great and the ambiance super fun :)!
author: Inga V.

description: Great place to stop for a drink after work. Upscale crowd, good drinks, competent staff and nice atmosphere. Looking forward to my next visit. Check it out, you'll like it.
author: J P.

description: Fun bar! Bartenders are fast and friendly. Great happy hour. Attracts a cool mix of people and I usually end up talking to someone interesting.
author: jared c.

description:
Great new bar.

The Financial District has too few excellent bars and Topsys is a welcome addition. The vibe is cool and fun without being pretentious. The drinks are good and reasonably priced, the food menu, while not extensive, does the job just fine and the service is friendly and professional.

It has become my new favorite bar in the FiDi.
author: Peter H.

description: This place is fairly new where the old Oz Lounge was. The place is a little on the dark lighting side. The drinks are strong and worth having during their happy hour. The bartender, Alexis, was really cool and hooked me up with another drink after I tipped over my original glass. Try the lychee martinis! So delicious.
author: Pamela B.

description: It's hard to find a place where one likes to come back. I have been here a few times and it never disappoints.  It's a cool place - great vibe. The people who hang here are trendy professionals, not trendy snobs. It gets busy but the bartenders are on top of it and I never had to wait long before getting their attention.  Great cocktail selection, good location - Cool overall - high points on my scale.
author: Natalya O.

description: My favorite spot for my World Cup FBMs (fake business meetings). Only qualm is it takes a longggg time to get a drink when it gets a little crowded. I felt somewhat ignored as other folks walked up after me and were served sooner on multiple visits across several weeks. Minus that, it's a cool spot with great decor and a very friendly staff.
author: Sam S.

description: Topsys is great!! It's hard to find a place that makes you feel like home in the financial district but Topsys does just that. It provides a fun and relaxed ambiance that helps you escape from all the hustle and bustle that consumes us downtown. They have a nice food menu and great beers on draft. Mix that in with a variety of craft cocktails and all our favorite sports teams you've got all your hearts desires. But that's not all. The fabulous service and super friendly, down to earth bartenders really make this a spot you can't miss. Two thumbs up plus five stars!
author: Mark U.

description: We went at 6 pm on a Saturday. Only 1 bartender. She made us the wrong drinks. She was happy to take back our drinks and make us what we ordered. The Topsy was yummy!
author: Nicole G.

description: Drinks are great, the food was all tasty. Bartender was overwhelmed by our large group that stopped by at happy hour, but the drinks and food were worth it.
author: T S.

description: A little bit loud but good drinks. I suggest getting their earlier in the night to get a seat. Solid location! Super close to Market.
author: Beth S.

description: We had our work team happy hour here.  It was awesome.  Reuben and his staff were great.  Very accommodating.  Could not ask for a better time.  Food, drinks, staff, all thumbs up !!!
author: Dean P.

description: Amazing place, very fun interior, the bartenders are FUN!!! One of the best locations for happy hours and get together drinks. Really loved the bartender and the special drinks!
author: Natasha B.

description: What a great place to kick off the weekend night! Creative bartenders will compose the perfect drink to satisfy any of your buzz cravings. Good for groups, good for meeting and mingling with new people, good place to pregame!!!
author: Dzmitry Y.

description: Came here on a Wednesday night and the band was awesome. What better to go with great music than strong cocktails and attentive service. Would most definitely return.
author: Yael W.

description: This bar opened a few months ago around the corner from my work and I am so thankful it did. I stumbled in here one night wanting one last drink and being shooed away from rickhouse. They did a great job remodeling, having been to OZ, the difference is night and day. This has now been my regular after work bar for a couple of months, and I have never been disappointed. Old carnival memorabilia and springy chairs are a nice touch that adds to the charm of this great place. The cocktail and spirit lists is top notch, but what really sets this place apart is the great service!! All the bartenders are great, but Sasha is my favorite, she's a highly skilled cocktail maker but still makes time to chat and connect with her guests, a skill often lost in many bars nowadays.
author: Vlad G.

description: I love topsys!! My girl friend and I! Go their all the time! We took some friends and they also loved it their! Topsys is our favorite spot to go hang out, great music great service and great drinks!
author: Cristian C.

description: Slow service (they only had one bartender working on a busy Tues night, not sure if that's the usual), but great drinks.
author: Jack K.

description: Awesome new place in the financial district. Super fun for happy hour and even later in the evening. Nice music, pretty staff, amazingly delish drinks. This place has quickly became one of my top choices for cocktails. I think they show games here too (but I'm not much of a sports fanatic).
author: Vita V.

description: I love that place! I go there all the time after work. Couple times a week they have live music, which is great. Service is also on the top, girls are awesome! I highly recommend Topsy's!
author: Tatiana Y.

description: Topsys fun house is an exciting mix of elegant cocktails and entertaining patrons. Ms Karina at the bar makes the evening irresistibly fun with a side of sass. Whatever you do, dont order her negroni...or you'll be grateful ....and who would want that?
author: Richie H.

description: Too cool. Stumbled upon this very wonderful neighborhood bar with great music and no cover.  A real surprise with great vibes, super  cocktails and great vibes.
author: Georgi G.

description: Great bar!! Had so much fun. Anna was a great bartender, fast and attentive. We had a good experience! Highly recommended on Thursday nights))
author: Julia B.

description: Came to San Francisco last week and was told multiple times to check out this spot. My friends definitely led me in the right direction. I came on a Thursday and the DJ was awesome. The energy was great and the drinks were tasty. I'll definitely head back to Topsy's when I'm in town again.
author: Christian F.

description: This is the second bar that Angela, the bar owner, opened in SF, and I am impressed with both. One can easily understand that she put a lot of effort and thought into design and creating classy yet easy going atmosphere. Bartenders are always welcoming and drinks are consistently great. Definitely a good spot to hang out and celebrate life.
author: Evgeni H.

description: Went here a few nights ago--great spot with good drinks and nice staff. The spring stools are fun and the ceiling art is weird but very cool. The strawberry basil martini was delicious and not too sweet. The contortionist was spicy yet well balanced. Looking forward to coming back!
author: Jay O.

description: My friend and I were looking for a place in the financial district to grab some drinks after work, and I'm glad that I stumbled upon Topsy's. The ambiance was good, and my lychee martini was delicious! The bar gets an extra star for the quick and attentive service.
author: Marina F.

description: This is my favorite place in SF. The drinks and atmosphere are amazing.  I can't wait for the downstairs to open.
author: E B.

description: Topsy's is one of those unexpected spots where you are pleasantly surprised. Do not be alarmed by the random circus decor and the bouncy bar stools. This just adds to the overall experience. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. And it doesn't feel like the "elite happy hour crowd" that is so prevalent in the financial district. Mark is the go-to bartender... We said we were looking for a whiskey drink and he whipped up some magical apricot cocktail. I will be sure to come back.
author: Jessica P.

description: Found my way into the coolest bar in the financial district. I don't use this phrase often but it is the hottest spot in downtown. Between the freshest ingredence, friendly interesting bartenders, and craft cocktail selection. I'm in love. The crowd is awesome as well. Soon they will have there own beers on tap as well!!! Fog Brewhouse is running there brewery downstairs.The food and the ambiance make for a great place to meet. Will def be a regular here.
author: Jessica L.

description: The dry passion (passion fruit, ginger, and gin) is delicious. The bar is beautiful inside: white marble, ceiling installations straight from a circus ringleader's attic, and antique glassware. The stools are giant springs, fun and a tad dangerous if you've had one too many. The bartenders are all professional, knowledgeable, and very friendly.
author: Yana N.

description: Topsy's has been my #1 choice ever since I discovered it. Great location, friendly staff, pleasant atmosphere and a lot of cool original cocktail recipes to try. If you haven't been yet - go now! What else are you going to do on a sunny Friday morning like this :)
author: D S.

description: Love this place; it is very cozy, has a character, great music and beautiful friendly bartenders. The drinks are great too. If you like spicy try the George Whitney margarita there; it is my favorite.  I also like that this place is universal; it is a perfect happy hour spot, but it also has  a great vibe for a Saturday night outing with friends.
author: Nadia P.
